description.value:
This template represents the results of a laboratory, radiology, or other study performed on a patient.
The result observation includes a statusCode to allow recording the status of an observation. Pending results (e.g., a test has been run but results have not been reported yet) should be represented as active ActStatus.
If code contains a valid non-null LOINC then the xsi:type value SHOULD match the LOINC Scale Part based on the table below:
| LOINC Scale Part | Value xsi:type | | -------- | ------- | | Qn - Quantitative | INT, IVL_INT, MO, IVL_MO, REAL, IVL_REAL, PQ, IVL_PQ, RTO, TS, IVL_TS | | Ord - Ordinal | CD | | Nom - Nominal | CD | | Nar - Narrative | ED, ST | | OrdQn - Quantitative or Ordinal | CD, INT, IVL_INT, MO, IVL_MO, REAL, IVL_REAL, PQ, IVL_PQ, RTO, TS, IVL_TS | | Multi - Multi | ED | | Doc - Document | ED |

comment.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 STATIC) (CONF:4537-7130).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: HL7ActMood urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 STATIC) (CONF:4537-7131).
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:4537-7137).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from CodeSystem LOINC (urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:4537-7133).

human.value: This code **SHOULD** be a code from the LOINC that identifies the result observation. If an appropriate LOINC code does not exist, then the local code for this result **SHALL** be sent (CONF:4537-19212).
SHALL contain either a @code attribute or a @nullFlavor attribute, but not both.

comment.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:4537-7134).
This statusCode SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC (CONF:4537-14849).

short.value: Represents the clinically relevant time of the measurement (e.g., the time a blood pressure reading is obtained, the time the blood sample was obtained for a chemistry test).

comment.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:4537-7140).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:4537-7143).

human.value: If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"): This value SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @unit, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC. Note: Base CDA requires that all @unit values SHALL be drawn from UCUM.
A coded or physical quantity value **MAY** contain zero or more [0..*] translations, which can be used to represent the original results as output by the lab (CONF:4537-31866).
If Observation/value is a CD (**xsi:type="CD"**) the value **SHOULD** be SNOMED-CT or LOINC (CONF:4537-32610).

comment.value: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Observation Interpretation (HL7) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.78 DYNAMIC (CONF:4537-7147).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:4537-7148).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:4537-7153).

short.value: Laboratory observations are expected to include the specimen participant. The specimen included at specimenPlayingEntity/code must be consistent with the observation/code.

comment.value: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:4537-32611).
The specimen, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] specimenRole (CONF:4537-32612).
This specimenRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] specimenPlayingEntity (CONF:4537-32613).
This specimenPlayingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Specimen type urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1099.54 DYNAMIC (CONF:4537-32614).
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] Author Participation (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119) (CONF:4537-7149).
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange (CONF:4537-7150).
The referenceRange, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange (CONF:4537-7151).
This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:4537-7152).
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:4537-32175).
